sshd.description: OpenSSH server component, providing secure encrypted communications between two untrusted hosts over an insecure network.

NetworkManager.description: Utility to manage network connections, aiming for Network Connectivity which "Just Works".

chrome.description: Google Chrome, a cross-platform web browser developed by Google.

cupsd.description: Common UNIX Printing System (CUPS) scheduler which handles printing jobs.

postgres.description: Powerful, open source object-relational database system.

systemd-resolve.description: System service that provides network name resolution to local applications.

thunderbird.description: Free email application that’s easy to set up and customize.

xrdp-sesman.description: Session manager component for XRDP, an open source remote desktop protocol server.

xrdp.description: Open source remote desktop protocol (RDP) server.

gvfsd-smb.description: GNOME Virtual File System daemon for SMB/CIFS file sharing protocol, used for accessing Windows file shares.

whatsdesk.description: WhatsDesk is a desktop client for WhatsApp. It allows users to access and use WhatsApp functionalities on their computers.

goa-daemon.description: GOA Daemon (goa-daemon) is part of GNOME Online Accounts (GOA) - a centralized service for integrating online accounts with the GNOME desktop environment.

jetbrains-toolb.description: JetBrains Toolbox is an application developed by JetBrains that manages and updates all JetBrains developer tools. It offers a centralized way to handle multiple JetBrains IDEs and utilities.
